name: Lucid Game Jam, DANCE MADNESS
description:
Cthulhu is having fun at the disco club. BUT He had too much drinks and he needs to go to the toilet... He will have to cross the crowd and other Great Ancients to be able to access the throne... but in RHYTHM.

Credit:

Développeur / Game  Deville Louis : CodAbs on Itch.IO

Boomer and Sound Designer : Arnaud Royer @ArnaudR on Itch.IO

Game Artist: Blanc Christophe

Game Artist: Harrison Eléa : Harry_Elea

Game Artist: Chapelle Jimmy
